item.title: It is reasonably (substantially) bigger hole and is deep., 9th October
item.description:
It is reasonably (substantially) big pothole and is deep. Also it appears that it is not new, surprisingly. Which means, and it appears that it has not been addressed so far - not sure if members of public or any person reporter earlier on this or not. And, it is the main road where buses (more than one bus) ply and pass through regularly, and multiple times a day. For me, while I was trying to turn over to from main road (new road) to a monk road, my noticed my car tyre hit this existing gap. I stopped, there itself and it did (made me feel as a driver) that it is not a normal (not a usual) pothole. I got down the car, stopping immediately and then noticed that it is deep and wider and crumbling down and wide (as it appears). Photos, I took, are attached for reference and so it can be looked in to and addressed before it impacts and becomes more damaging to vehicles and beings.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Requesting new lamp post, 9th October
item.description:
The street Roundwood is very dark with no lighting at all reaching most of the street after dark. would like to request that a new light post be installed on the street to enable the safety and security of residents and pedestrians in the area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Roundwood, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Complaint!!, 9th October
item.description:
High street / masons hill road works. No one working. 1 hour to get out of town. Traffic built back from town to southborough lane / Bromley common. Why is no one working here?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Masons Hill, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Utility Works and Temporary Traffic Lights

item.title: Alleged hidden spy cam, 9th October
item.description:
It has been posted in a local facebook group that there is a spy camera here that is filming people who deface the roundabout for the purpose of harassing them by means of identification. This has been mentioned for several days and is threatening.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Picardy Manorway, Lower Belvedere, London
